lobby.intro:
Play Codenames Pictures online across multiple devices on a shared board.
To create a new game or join an existing
game, enter a game identifier and click 'GO'.

customImages.part1: You can use your own images using the field below. See
customImages.part2: for information about valid link options

mods.head: There are also modes availabble to play.

mods.description: Words only (only Polish words supported for the moment

mods.default2: To start specified mode paste 'Code' to input below and start game

image-link.placeholder: Mode / Link to text file or folder of images...
image-link.bad: There was something wrong with your image link :( Try again?

lobby.enjoying-game: If you're joining a game that already exists, this field will be ignored. Have fun!!!

welcome.title: Welcome to {{framework}}
welcome.intro: To get  started, edit <1><0></0></1> and save to reload.
